column2: g3 <- ggplot(subdat, aes(x = s.home, y = round(t0.freq*384), col = s.home, size = t0.freq*384, group = BC)) + geom_point() + theme_bw() + scale_color_gradientn(colors = viridis(10)) + facet_wrap(~ SP)

Install it with: `devtools::install_github('hadley/ggplot2')`
